Tagline: Small to X-Large Vacuum Chambers, Systems, and Leak Test Solutions
Overview:
Redline Chambers builds large custom vacuum chambers for altitude testing, electronics, computers, complete systems, shock, impacts, plasma, space simulation, targets or degassing large parts or components.
Providing engineered solutions for a variety of industries and vacuum applications:

Aerospace       
Bio & Pharmaceutical
Clean Technology
Defense
General Industrial
Government
Medical Devices
National Labs
Oil & Gas
Research & Development
LED
Solar
Nuclear
